casebody.data:
Anthony G. Apicella et al. v. Connecticut Attorneys Title Insurance Company (13505)

Dupont, C. J., and Lavery and Hennessy, Js.

Argued April 19 decision released May 16, 1995 Lori Weleh-Rubin, with whom was Douglas Apicella, for the appellants (plaintiffs). Craig A. Fontaine, with whom was Paul T. Edwards, for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
